Anakin Skywalker.Action: Responds politely and warmly to Jar Jar's excited greeting and hug.
Tries to compliment Padmé in a somewhat awkward and sincere way, showing affection and care.
Promises Padmé that they will find out who is trying to kill her, expressing commitment and protective intent.
Bites his lip in frustration and shame after his awkward compliment, showing sensitivity and self-awareness.
Attempts to be smooth and charming when greeting Padmé, but embarrasses himself.
Promises Padmé that they will find out who is trying to kill her, showing confidence and commitment.
Bites his lip in frustration and shame after failing to be smooth, showing self-awareness but also insecurity.
Promises to find out who is trying to kill Padmé; shows concern and protective instincts.
Argues with Obi-Wan about their mandate and questions authority to protect Padmé; implies care but challenges leadership.
Expresses sadness that Padmé did not recognize him, revealing vulnerability and emotional sincerity.
Meditates quietly and stays alert, responding swiftly but calmly to a perceived disturbance by reaching for his lightsaber and then relaxing.
Willing to use Padmé as bait to catch an assassin, confident in his ability to sense everything going on in the room.
Shrugs when questioned about Padmé covering the camera, showing a lack of thoroughness or concern for surveillance details.
Expresses longing and affection for Padmé, showing vulnerability and sincerity.
Defends Padmé passionately against Obi-Wan's warnings, showing loyalty but some naivety.
Dismisses Obi-Wan's caution about politics as a 'lecture' and generalization.
Throws himself in front of Padmé to protect her from deadly creatures, actively defending her.
Urgently instructs Padmé to stay safe while he goes out to help Obi-Wan.
Dashes out alone to attempt to aid Obi-Wan despite danger.
Throws himself in front of Padme, swiftly kills half the Kouhuns with his lightsaber to protect her.
Looks stunned and sharply at Obi-Wan after hearing his comment about Palpatine.
Turns to Padme and commands her to stay while he rushes out to pursue the threat.
Arrives to rescue Obi-Wan by providing a speeder during a dangerous chase, expressing concern.
Teases Obi-Wan about his own skills and preferences with playful, confident banter.
Apologizes to Obi-Wan for risky flying, showing awareness of others' feelings.
Exhibits reckless flying behavior putting self and others at risk despite warnings.
Commands Obi-Wan to clear a flag obstructing their speeder's engine to regain power, apologizes after Obi-Wan expresses concern.
Repeatedly apologizes to Obi-Wan for risky maneuvers that worry him.
Ignores Obi-Wan's warning to slow down near dangerous power couplings, pressing forward aggressively.
Sheepishly admits he could have made it when Obi-Wan angrily criticizes him.
Challenges Obi-Wan's anger calmly and reassures him that they haven't lost the target yet.
Refers to the target as 'that creep' and expresses a personal desire for revenge or confrontation.
Apologizes to Obi-Wan after losing the target.
Pursues and confronts the bounty hunter Zam aggressively, putting himself in physical danger.
Spots an opportunity mid-chase, jumps onto the bounty hunter's speeder, and climbs skillfully despite nearly slipping, showing physical agility and quick thinking.
Uses the Force to pull the bounty hunter's gun out of her hand during a struggle, demonstrating skillful use of abilities.
Is momentarily disarmed when Zam shoots the lightsaber out of his hand, showing a vulnerability in combat readiness.
Seemingly loses the bounty hunter during the chase initially, but quickly recovers and attempts bold maneuvers.
Chases after ZAM through a crowded, dangerous street despite difficulties, showing persistence in protecting others.
Barges into people in the crowd while pursuing ZAM, showing impatience and disregard for others' personal space.
Apologizes to Obi-Wan for losing his lightsaber and responds respectfully to Obi-Wan's reprimand.
Uses the Force effectively to pull the Jedi weapon out of Zam's hand during a physical struggle.
Although thrown from the speeder and losing physical control, he quickly recovers and continues pursuit of Zam in a crowded, chaotic environment.
Struggles to navigate effectively through a dense crowd, repeatedly bumping into bystanders and nearly losing the target.
Loses his lightsaber during the chase and needs to be given it back by Obi-Wan, who admonishes him for its care, showing a lack of discipline or situational awareness.
Expresses sincere affection and concern for Obi-Wan, saying 'I love you' and 'I don't want to cause you pain.'
Acknowledges he hasn't fully learned a lesson but shows willingness to do better and promises to listen.
Blends into hostile and suspicious crowd but no overt hostile or warm actions observed.
Joins Obi-Wan in confronting and controlling a dangerous situation with calm authority, using his lightsaber to support and intimidate the hostile crowd effectively.
Directly demands information from the injured assassin despite her obvious hostility and pain, showing assertiveness and confidence.
Urgently demands to know who hired Zam Wessel to protect others.
Reassures Padmé with 'Don't worry...' despite her bad mood.
Demands urgently and confidently who hired Zam, showing assertiveness and focus during interrogation.
Fails to prevent Zam's death despite being present, indicating limited control over situation outcome.
Attempts to reassure Padmé despite the tense situation, showing some emotional steadiness and confidence.
Tries to comfort Padmé by telling her not to worry about the investigation.
Attempts to share his opinion about pride and doing what is requested, but apologizes quickly when Padmé rebukes him.
Rejects the pet name 'Annie' from Padmé, insisting on being called Anakin as a sign of maturity.
Shows gratitude and respect for his mentor Obi-Wan, acknowledging his wisdom and power.
Expresses frustration about being judged unfairly and misunderstood by his master.
Responds to Padmé's gentle teasing with defensiveness but does not lash out.
Shares a sincere and intimate moment of eye contact with Padmé, showing openness and connection.
Makes a light-hearted joke about Padmé's Jedi powers, showing playfulness and friendliness.
Quickly apologizes to Padmé when she expresses discomfort, indicating respect and consideration.
Obeys Obi-Wan's instructions to stay put and not attract attention on Naboo, showing discipline and cautiousness.
Shows a frown and hesitation when told to remain inactive, indicating possible internal conflict or lack of confidence in the passive role.
Accepts responsibility as protector for Padmé and carries luggage calmly, demonstrating readiness and reliability.
Expresses fear about his first solo assignment but proceeds confidently with Padmé and Artoo.
Laughs with Padmé, showing composure despite fear.
No direct display of skill or problem solving in this excerpt; mainly emotional response.
PADMÉ wipes sweat from Anakin's forehead while he is distressed after a nightmare, and Anakin accepts the comfort silently.
Anakin is restless and troubled during sleep, muttering 'No, no, Mom, no...'
Despite physical exhaustion and nightmares, remains present and responsive when waking, showing mental engagement.
Appears confused upon waking from nightmare, indicating some internal turmoil affecting situational awareness.
Accepts food offered by Padmé politely and expresses gratitude.
Shares personal feelings about Naboo and his longing to see it again.
Expresses mature feelings and openness about love and attachment despite Jedi prohibitions.
Stares at Padmé intensely, which unnerves her.
Clearly and confidently articulates a nuanced understanding of Jedi principles about attachment, possession, and love.
Engages in deep introspection and expresses mature feelings about his past, present, and hopes for Naboo.
Lets intense emotions and personal attachment show openly, possibly risking revealing inner conflicts to others.
Expresses love and appreciation for Naboo.
Confides to Padmé about fears and worries concerning his mother.
Expresses a sentimental and positive feeling about Naboo, showing appreciation for a place he imagines as home.
Admits to feeling homesick and lonely at the start of his training, revealing vulnerability and sincerity.
Shows reflection on his past feelings of homesickness and loneliness while beginning Jedi training.
Shares feelings of loneliness and homesickness openly with Padmé.
Engages in friendly, sincere conversation with Padmé, showing interest in her past and views.
Expresses support for Padmé and confidence in their generation's potential to change the galaxy profoundly.
Passively follows Padmé toward the palace without initiating or leading any actions.
Insists on being in charge of security, responds nettled and interrupts Padmé.
Takes a deep breath and apologizes to Padmé after initial confrontation.
Glares at Padmé after decision is made, showing resentment.
Asserts himself strongly as being in charge of security, showing confidence in his role.
Refuses to listen initially to Padmé's suggestion despite her knowledge of the area, showing stubbornness and poor judgment.
Eventually calms down and apologizes, indicating ability to control emotions and accept advice.
He wanted to be the best with a lightsaber, unmatched in old style fencing; his knowledge of the Force was unique.
Hangs back shyly when arriving at Padme's house, not engaging immediately with children.
Greets Padme's sister Sola politely with a simple 'Hello'.
Responds modestly to being offered food saying 'A little' hungry, showing politeness.
Participates in the family dinner by sitting down and sharing food with Padme's family.
Admits that Padme is in danger honestly when asked.
Engages in polite conversation with Padme's family and shows interest in Ruwee's background.
Admits that Padme is in danger, showing awareness of the situation.
Engages in polite conversation with Ruwee and asks about her work, demonstrating social awareness and confidence.
Does not correct Padme’s mother’s misunderstanding about his role immediately, allowing the group to stay misinformed.
Reassures Ruwee about Padmé's safety and expresses concern.
Engages calmly in conversation about dangers and protection.
Calmly explains the security situation regarding the attempts on Padmé's life and expresses confidence that his Master will find the assassins quickly.
Shows concern for Padmé’s safety and wants to arrive before dark, indicating practical awareness and responsibility.
Does not engage in dispute or distraction when family members discuss feelings, maintaining focus on the underlying threat.
Looks around the room and engages in a thoughtful conversation with Padme, showing attentiveness and awareness of surroundings.
Observes and compares two holograms of Padme, connecting past and present in a meaningful way.
Focuses on personal and emotional subjects rather than mission or task at hand, showing distraction.
Looks at Padmé silently while she shares a personal memory and expresses appreciation for the water.
Engages in a meaningful, emotionally intelligent conversation with Padmé, showing perceptiveness and emotional sensitivity.
Expresses his feelings confidently and initiates a kiss, displaying confidence but also potential lack of restraint.
Admits loss of control over his thoughts around Padmé, indicating self-awareness but also difficulty managing emotions.
Admits to intense emotional vulnerability and expresses sincere love and torment over Padme, showing openness and deep sincerity.
Presses Padme to admit her feelings and insists on the possibility of their relationship despite risks, showing persistence but limited tolerance for realistic boundaries.
Expresses deep emotional turmoil and obsession with Padme, showing lack of emotional control.
Persists in pursuing a forbidden romantic relationship despite clear warnings about consequences and his Jedi responsibilities.
Acknowledges the need to be rational but struggles to act accordingly, indicating difficulties managing internal conflict.
Acknowledges his feelings honestly, admits he cannot wish them away.
Suggests keeping his relationship with Padmé a secret to preserve it.
Concedes that living a lie would destroy their relationship, showing sensitivity to Padmé's concerns.
Acknowledges that keeping a secret relationship would destroy them after thoughtful consideration
Expresses inability to be rational or dismiss feelings despite recognizing dire consequences
Engages Padmé in a relaxed, playful conversation, compliments her mind, listens to her story about Palo.
Expresses skepticism about politicians but admits to liking some, discusses political ideals openly and thoughtfully.
Engages Padmé in thoughtful conversation about politics and idealism, expressing ideas on effective government and problem-solving.
Dismisses the effectiveness of current politicians with a general statement that the system does not work, showing skepticism but not providing detailed critique or alternatives initially.
Engages in playful teasing and joking with Padmé, including light sarcasm and playful banter.
Juggles fruit and participates in playful activities with Padmé, causing them both to laugh and share a joyful moment.
Acts silly and makes a funny face after falling off the Shaak, showing a lighthearted, friendly side.
Expresses authoritarian ideas about forcing people to agree, implying support for making others comply without clear respect for autonomy.
Shows a humorous, playful side by teasing Padmé and juggling fruit, demonstrating agility and reflexes.
Suggests that disagreements should be forcefully resolved by 'someone wise', showing a simplistic and authoritarian mindset with little clarity on execution.
Admits uncertainty about who would enforce agreement on others, indicating a lack of concrete planning or leadership clarity.
Engages in playful antics with the Shaak and falls off, but recovers with humor, showing physical competence but some clumsiness.
Plays and wrestles affectionately with Padme, shares a moment of vulnerability then helps her up kindly, comfortable and relaxed in each other's presence.
Catches Padme's arm quickly when she swings at him, engages physically and playfully with her, and confidently helps her up by holding out his hand.
Moves restlessly in his sleep, muttering and crying out from a nightmare.
Meditates in the morning to calm himself and acknowledges Padmé's presence as soothing.
Denies having nightmares despite clearly experiencing them.
Decides to disobey his Jedi mandate and leave to help his suffering mother despite knowing he risks punishment and expulsion from the Jedi Order.
Clearly visualizes and senses his mother's suffering, indicating a strong connection and awareness.
Politely asks the droid driver to wait.
Greets Watto respectfully and tries to communicate in Huttese.
Offers to help Watto with the fiddly droid part.
Shows sincere interest in finding his mother, Shmi Skywalker.
Communicates effectively in Huttese to get Watto's attention and stop the malfunctioning pit droids.
Offers to help repair Watto's fiddly droid equipment and succeeds in fixing it, surprising Watto.
Shows concern about his mother’s whereabouts and wellbeing; insists on finding out where she is.
Shows determination to find his mother by insisting on knowing her location and pushing Watto to check his records.
No action or presence in the excerpt; all described events focus on Obi-Wan and Jango Fett.
Greets C-3PO warmly and acknowledges him by name, showing recognition and friendliness.
Arrives with Padme to visit his mother, indicating care and concern for family.
Climbs up at the last moment, showing physical capability and strong survival instinct by grabbing the edge of the platform after a dangerous fall.
Arrives with Padme at the homestead and approaches C-3PO confidently, indicating purposeful and clear intent.
Does not intervene or show immediate reaction to Jango Fett's escape or Obi-Wan's fall in this excerpt, possibly indicating delayed response or hesitation.
Introduces himself confidently to Owen Lars and directly asks about his mother upon arrival.
Relies on others to provide information rather than taking independent action or showing initiative in searching for his mother.
Insists on searching for his missing mother despite warnings; expresses belief she is still alive.
Tells Padme she must stay behind for safety and entrusts her care to Owen.
Abruptly turns away after declaring his resolve to find his mother.
Decides to go find his mother despite warnings and odds; confidently takes initiative to act on his belief she is alive.
Dismisses others' advice about the hopelessness of the situation, showing determination but possibly recklessness.
Arranges for Padme to stay safe, entrusting Owen with her protection, demonstrating planning and responsibility.
Asks Jawas for directions and quickly sets off to investigate the situation on Tatooine.
Stops to examine tracks carefully before continuing pursuit on speeder bike.
Rides efficiently through diverse and difficult terrain during nighttime pursuit.
Created C-3PO but neglected to give him an outer covering, leaving the droid exposed and vulnerable.
Sneaks into a Tusken camp to rescue his mother, gently cradles her, and comforts her despite her severe injuries.
Successfully scouts the Tusken camp stealthily, avoiding detection by guards.
Uses his lightsaber skillfully to cut a hole in the hut wall to gain entry.
Carefully rescues his injured mother, showing tenderness and concern.
Comforts his dying mother, assuring her that everything will be fine, expresses deep love and connection.
Cradles his dead mother silently, showing profound grief and attachment.
Stands outside the hut with a grim mask, activates his lightsaber after seeing fallen Tusken guards, implying possible anger and impending violence.
Cradles his dead mother and shows emotional depth and resolve despite his grief.
Switches on his lightsaber with a grim, determined expression outside the Tusken hut, indicating readiness and decisiveness.
Immediately decides to go after Obi-Wan despite the danger, showing concern and urgency.
Acknowledges Padme's advice and agrees to retransmit message, showing willingness to listen.
Immediately decides to go after Obi-Wan upon seeing the interrupted hologram message, showing decisive and proactive behavior.
Acknowledges Padme's suggestion to retransmit the message first, demonstrating willingness to listen and consider alternate approaches.
Respects Master Windu's orders to stay and protect Padmé despite desire to act impulsively to save Obi-Wan, showing obedience and restraint.
Allows Padmé to take initiative to save Obi-Wan and willingly follows her lead, indicating trust and cooperation.
Briefly puts his hand over Padmé's to stop her from acting rashly but then smiles and takes controls following her decision, showing concern mixed with warmth and support.
Acknowledges and accepts Master Windu's order to stay and protect Padme, showing respect for command.
Initially stops Padme from taking control, showing cautiousness and adherence to orders.
Despite strict orders, agrees to accompany Padme to save Obi-Wan, showing flexibility but also willingness to risk disobedience.
Grabs Padme's arm abruptly to prevent her from leaving the cockpit.
Quickly reacts to Padme's attempt to leave the ship alone by abruptly stopping her, showing decisiveness and protective instincts.
Grabs Padmé's arm to prevent her from going out, insisting it is too dangerous and refusing to let her decide for herself.
Scratches his head and follows Padmé after she storms out, showing hesitation and willingness to accompany her despite the conflict.
Stands behind Padmé as a guard, remaining physically protective but does not activate his lightsaber despite provocation.
Grabs his lightsaber in a tense negotiation but does not ignite it, showing restraint.
Remains physically passive despite a high-stakes confrontation, deferring dialogue to others.
Hesitates before giving his lightsaber to Jango Fett, indicating internal conflict.
Hands over his weapon to avoid escalating violence.
Hesitates but ultimately surrenders his lightsaber to Jango Fett when threatened.
Reassures Padmé by telling her not to be afraid in a dangerous situation.
Expresses a sincere vow to spend the rest of his life with Padmé, showing commitment and emotional openness.
Reassures Padmé not to be afraid despite their dire situation.
Expresses emotional vulnerability and confusion about their forbidden love.
Makes a confident vow to spend his life with Padmé despite impending death.
Does not attempt to escape or resist when captured and chained, showing passivity in a dangerous situation.
Retransmits Obi-Wan's message and decides to come to rescue him.
Expresses concern with 'I have a bad feeling about this.'
Lands on the back of the REEK, wraps chain around its horn to control it.
Uses the free length of chain to lure the REEK to bite, then yanks on it to ride the beast.
Checks on Padmé after danger and urges her to jump to safety, then helps her onto the Reek and ensures she is positioned safely.
Responds quickly to Padmé’s danger by charging in on the Reek and urging Padmé to jump, facilitating her escape from the Nexu.
Hauls Padmé upright on the Reek and coordinates with her for escape, showing decisive and confident action under pressure.
Fights alongside Padme back-to-back, defending each other during the battle.
Insists on going after Count Dooku to protect Padme, showing determination and protective intent.
Disregards Obi-Wan's caution and charges recklessly at Count Dooku, putting himself at great risk.
Expresses anger and a desire for revenge for the Jedi deaths by Dooku, indicating strong emotions that may cloud judgment.
Charges to defend Obi-Wan against Count Dooku and fights bravely despite the danger.
Continues to attack even when outmatched and suffers severe injury.
Intervenes to defend Obi-Wan by challenging Count Dooku directly and managing to wound him despite being a Padawan.
Charges at Count Dooku and fights with determination and skill, momentarily catching the Count off balance.
Fights using two lightsabers after Obi-Wan tosses him a second one, showing adaptability and confidence in combat.
Is ultimately overpowered by Count Dooku, losing one lightsaber and sustaining a severe injury (his arm cut off).
Drops to the ground in agony and is unable to prevent Dooku preparing a finishing blow.
Struggles to support the exhausted Yoda but is barely able to stand himself after the confrontation.
